snippet: Only 26 men have scaled the top of the ATP world tennis rankings but for some of them it has been such a fleeting experience that their names have been reduced to obscure pub quiz questions....
lead_paragraph: Only 26 men have scaled the top of the ATP world tennis rankings but for some of them it has been such a fleeting experience that their names have been reduced to obscure pub quiz questions.

headline.print_headline: Murray Hungry to Keep on Improving, Says Gilbert
headline.main: Murray Hungry to Keep on Improving, Says Gilbert
